title: Camera Orthographic
description: An orthographic camera containing properties to create an orthographic projection matrix.

xmag.description: The floating-point horizontal magnification of the view. This value **MUST NOT** be equal to zero. This value **SHOULD NOT** be negative.

ymag.description: The floating-point vertical magnification of the view. This value **MUST NOT** be equal to zero. This value **SHOULD NOT** be negative.

zfar.description: The floating-point distance to the far clipping plane. This value **MUST NOT** be equal to zero. `zfar` **MUST** be greater than `znear`.

znear.description: The floating-point distance to the near clipping plane.
